name: Obsidian (itch) (dotcomboom)
description:
Small game cooked up in Construct 2 with an idea I had still knocking around. In a 60 second time period, form and collect as much obsidian as possible.

Controls:

  • Mouse wheel: Up for rotating the paddle clockwise, Down for rotating the paddle counter-clockwise.
  • Or keyboard: A/Left or D/Right to rotate.
  • Hold left mouse button: Collect

While collecting:

  • Obsidian (formed by the combination of water and lava): +1 point
  • Lava: -2 points (avoid collecting this!)
